Back by popular demand.  2 sold today alone.  'T206' raw boxes.  Tobacco & E Card box.

Net54 Discount is $145 + $25 S/H via PayPal, Check, MO.  

Please reference the above link for more information and contact me via PM for other details etc.

Designed to comfortably (not tight) 525.  Please see the website for more details.

[url]http://www.dakotawoodcrafts.com[/url]
A few sold this week.  Oak and Walnut still available.
Bump - a couple of each color are still available.  Half are gone!

bump - just a couple of each type of wood remain!  These are all that remain from a second and likely final batch.  Price lowered for Net54 members!  $145 + $25 FedEx S/H.

Graded card boxes are in the works:

Jon:
Would love a T206 box how do I get the net 54 member discount?
Please send me an email at [url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url] thanks!
Sold a couple more - now only 1 or 2 of each color remain.  No plans to produce more - graded card boxes are next.  PM if interested.

These boxes are very high quality.  Bought one awhile back.  If you are working on a raw T206, it's the perfect way to store them.  A full set will fit comfortably in it, and it is compact enough to fit inside a standard 5x10 safety deposit box.  Perfect in every way.

^^Thanks for the feedback!^^

Last walnut box just sold.  Now only 2 oak T206 (with or without logo) boxes remain!  PM if interested.  Graded card boxes are next.
Only one box remains!  Oak with or without logo.  Price remains @ $170 dlvd.  PM me for details.
Beautiful picture Rob.  One oak (lighter color) box remains with or without logo.  No plans for more!
p beautifull pic ! These box look amazing !
